metadata.description: **Hellboy's creator takes on history's greatest monster!** After a fight with Hellboy, Frankenstein's monster escapes the terrible Mexican laboratory where he was imprisoned and discovers strange creatures beneath the desert, where he'll learn some of the greatest secrets of the mystical world! * One of the most anticipated comic books of 2015! The iconic Frankenstein creature as imagined by the master of modern horror comics.
metadata.name: Frankenstein Underground
